Announcing first ever... blog post!

29 Apr 2014

Yo, check out my link.

What's this?

My very interesting post about:

  • Nothing.
  • Not much.
  • Nada.
  • Zilch.

Check out my code

You can highlight code elements with backquotes.

1 // Meaningful comment
2 
3 val bob: String = "bob"

And now...

Well, the way they make shows is, they make one show. That show's called a pilot. Then they show that show to the people who make shows, and on the strength of that one show they decide if they're going to make more shows. Some pilots get picked and become television programs. Some don't, become nothing. She starred in one of the ones that became nothing.

  • Sidebar includes support for textual modules and a dynamically generated navigation with active link support
  • Two orientations for content and sidebar, default (left sidebar) and reverse (right sidebar), available via <body> classes
  • Eight optional color schemes, available via <body> classes
